snippet: Hundreds objected to a statement from top newspaper editors that they would refrain from publishing articles critical of the government during a time of fierce fighting with militant extremists.
abstract: Hundreds of Egyptian journalists object to pledge by top newspaper editors that they will refrain from publishing articles critical of the government during a time of fierce fighting with militant extremists.
lead_paragraph: Hundreds objected to a statement from top newspaper editors that they would refrain from publishing articles critical of the government during a time of fierce fighting with militant extremists.

headline.main: Egyptian Journalists Protest Editors’ Pledge Not to Criticize State
headline.print_headline: Egyptian Journalists Protest Editors’ Pledge Not to Criticize State
